meanings.definition: A family of small rodents including hamsters, voles, and lemmings.
meanings.sent1: Cricetids are cute little rodents that include hamsters and voles.
meanings.sent2: I saw a cricetid scurrying around in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The cricetids had a party in the burrow last night.
meanings.sent4: The field was alive with cricetids, like a bustling miniature city.
meanings.sent5: The children were delighted to watch the cricetids play in the grass.

meanings.definition: Any member of the family Cricetidae.
meanings.sent1: A cricetid is a type of rodent that belongs to the Cricetidae family.
meanings.sent2: The zoo has a special exhibit featuring various cricetids.
meanings.sent3: The cricetid family reunion was a squeaky affair.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the cricetids moved like shadows among the trees.
meanings.sent5: The scientist studied the behavior of cricetids in their natural habitat.
